description: Complete system overview documenting the card game architecture, component relationships, and core game mechanics
Documentation of core game entities including cards, battlefield grid, player stats (health/momentum/energy), and game state models
Detailed documentation of key algorithms including battlefield management, card deployment logic, turn sequencing, and combat resolution
Documentation of data flow between major game components: Battlefield, CardHand, GameInterface, PlayerHUD, and TurnManager including state updates
Documentation of React component hierarchy, state management patterns, and UI/UX implementation for the game interface
